title: Project Management API
description: A Flask/PostgreSQL REST API that provides endpoints for managing users, tasks, and their associations. Supports user registration, authentication, and admin privileges.

title: Interview Scheduling API
description: A Flask/SQLite REST API that provides endpoints for managing interviews. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on interview records.

title: Data Science Salaries Analysis
description:
Analyzed data science salaries, considering location, experience, and other factors.

Identified key findings, including the impact of the pandemic on the salaries, with a notable decline in 2021 and rapid recovery in 2022, suggesting their higher susceptibility to pandemic impacts.
